All.Comments: Fix the final secret if secret randomization is not enabled (if the trigger isn't there, nothing is done).
Fix the out of place texture in room 2.
Add a missing face at the very end of the level.
Convert Adam's door into the same style as the one in Atlantis.
Fix the bad geometry in room 25.

Any.Comments: Convert the unused Atlantis lever into spikes.
Convert the other unused Atlantis lever into a blade.
Add a surprise behind Adam's door.

Leader.Comments: Remove the default lever texture in room 19.
Remove the default lever texture in room 63.

Condition.Comments: If Lara is in room 2 and so are the Atlantis clang-clang doors, convert them into pickups.
If Adam isn't here, change the default way the door opens.

OnFalse.Comments: Make a room to house a switch.
Duplicate one of the heavy triggers to capture everything Adam would trigger.
Convert the duplicated trigger into a switch type.
Clear the heavy triggers from the platform.

Mirrored.Comments: Move the antipad for the door after the lava flow traps in case there are items to collect on the other side.
